data.system_settings: iPhone 6s iOS 12.1 Dev Beta 2 - Windows 10 Home x64 1803
data.actual_result: Developer Mode can be toggled on/off despite having "sync across clients" turned off
data.expected_result: Developer Mode toggle doesn't change because "sync across clients" is turned off
data.short_description: Developer Mode can be toggled on and off from desktop when "sync across clients" is turned off
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into user settings on your phone, and go to appearance - Toggle off the "Sync across clients" option - Go into appearance settings on your computer and change your theme - Verify that your theme didn't change on your phone - Toggle Developer Mode off/on from your computer, and observe the toggle on your phone
